title: Coronavirus: AfDB approves $2m (...)
text:
Coronavirus: AfDB approves $2m package for WHO's Africa response

[Africanews - Africa] - 2/04/2020

The coronavirus epidemic continues to disrupt life across the world. The disruption is all but gathering steam in affected even virus-free African countries. The rate of infection is lower on the continent as compared to Europe, Asia and parts of the Americas, where lockdowns are in place. The (...)

... Article published by "Africanews" (Africa), read the rest of the news

For any information or claim on this article, see directly with the newspaper.
